trans-unit.source: Enumerates the content types for the speaking of elements such as times, dates, and currency.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom-típusok enumerálása, az a beszéd elemek, mint időkorlátja, dátumok és pénznem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A> method uses members of the SayAs enumeration to specify the content type of the appended text, which the speech synthesis engine can use to inform its pronunciation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A>módszer a SayAs számbavétel tagjainak használja a tartalom adja meg a hozzáfűzött szöveg, és a beszédfelismerési összefoglaló segítségével tájékoztatja a kiejtés.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Speak a number sequence as a date.
For example, speak “05/19/2004” or “19.5.2004” as “may nineteenth two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "05/19/2004" vagy "19.5.2004", "lehet, hogy a két példányban tizenkilencedik négy".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number as the day in a date.
trans-unit.target: Egy szám beszéd a napot a dátumból.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “3rd” as “third”.
To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a day and month.
For example, speak “12/05” as “May twelfth”, and speak “05/12” as “December 5th”.
trans-unit.target: Például "12/05", "Lehet, hogy tizenkettedik" beszéd, és beszéljen "05/12", "December 5.".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year.
trans-unit.target: Beszéd például év, hónap és nap dátumként számsorozatot.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “12/05/2004” as “May twelfth two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "12/05/2004", az"tizenkettedik két példányban négy".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a word as a month.
For example, speak “June” as “June”.
To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a month and day.
For example, speak “05/12” as “may twelfth”, and speak “12/5” as “December 5th”.
trans-unit.target: Például "05/12", "lehet, hogy tizenkettedik" beszéd, és beszéljen "12/5", "December 5.".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year.
trans-unit.target: Beszéd például év, hónap és nap dátumként számsorozatot.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “12/05/2004” as “December fifth two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "12/05/2004", "December ötödik két példányban négy".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a month and year.
For example, speak “05/2004” as “May two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "05/2004", mert "Lehet, hogy a két példányban négy".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number as a cardinal number.
For example, speak "3" as "three".
To be added.
Speak a number as an ordinal number.
For example, speak "3rd" as "third".
To be added.
Spell the word or phrase.
For example, say “clock” as “C L O C K”.
trans-unit.target: Tegyük fel, hogy "órajelsebességgel", "C L O C K".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a U.S. telephone number.
For example, speak “(306) 555-1212” as “Area code three zero six five five five one two one two”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "(306) 555-1212" "területen kódot három nulla hat öt öt öt egy két egy két".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak the word or phrase as text.
trans-unit.target: A szó vagy kifejezés beszéd szövegként.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “timeline” as “timeline”.
To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a time.
For example, speak “9:45” as “nine forty-five”, and speak “9:45am” as “nine forty-five A M”.
trans-unit.target: Például "9:45", "kilenc forty-five" beszéd, és beszéljen "9 óra&45; perckor" "kilenc forty-five egy M".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a time using the 12-hour clock.
For example, speak “03:25” as “three twenty-five”.
trans-unit.target: Például a beszéd "03:25", "három erdőtopológia kezelésre öt".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a time using the 24-hour clock.
trans-unit.target: A 24 órás formátumban időszakot számsorozatot beszéd.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “18:00” as “eighteen hundred hours”.
To be added.
Speak a number as a year.
For example, speak “1998” as “nineteen ninety-eight”.
To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a year and month.
For example, speak “2004/05” as “May two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "2004/05", "Lehet, hogy a két példányban négy" szerint.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Speak a number sequence as a date including the day, month, and year.
trans-unit.target: Beszéd például év, hónap és nap dátumként számsorozatot.

trans-unit.source: For example, speak “2004/05/12” as “May twelfth two thousand four”.
trans-unit.target: Például beszéd "2004/05/12", az"tizenkettedik két példányban négy".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
